A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Save you money and avoid this movie. I thought it was horrible. It was like a bunch of 12 year olds wrote it. The plot is not chronologically laid out. Things were thrown in for no apparent reason like that trip to the Monte Carlo Star Wars Bar scene. The character make up seemed for no reason other than to placate some consultant. The technical part was bad. One minute the character would have a huge scar. The next minute the scar was gone or reduced in size. It seemed to go on and on and on. Events were not explained like how bad off the rebellion was. Leah being sucked out in space then pushing herself back in? Then the bridge was fixed?  It was distressing to see such a fine movie franchise laid to waste.
